MTR.BA.long_name: Mercado A Termino De Buenos Aires S.A.
MTR.BA.summary: Mercado A Termino De Buenos Aires S.A. operates as an agricultural futures and options Exchange in Latin America. Its electronic platform enables approximately 80 members trade futures and options contracts on agricultural commodities. The company registers, guarantees, clears, and settles contracts traded at the Exchange. It also provides educational and training programs covering a range of topics, including derivatives, strategies, back office administration, and others. The company was formerly known as Mercado de Cereales a TÃ©rmino de Buenos Aires S.A. and changed its name to Mercado A Termino De Buenos Aires S.A. in August 1991. The company was founded in 1907 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

VALO.BA.summary: Grupo Financiero Valores S.A. engages in financial and investment activities. The company offers commercial banking services comprising investment banking products; and engages in the trading and negotiation of futures contracts and options. It also executes trades and provides clearing house and central counterparty services for the settlement and monitoring of transactions, as well as offers risk management services. The company was formerly known as Mercado de Valores de Buenos Aires S.A. and changed its name to Grupo Financiero Valores S.A. Grupo Financiero Valores S.A. was founded in 1929 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
